description: Open source replacement to the stock SMS app on Android. A revival of QKSMS. Open source replacement to the stock SMS app on Android. A revival of QKSMS. ## Features - Scheduled Messages - Message Backup - Speech to Text and Text to Speech integrated within the app - Message Blocking and Archiving - Voice Messages - Attachments of any type of file - Message Sorting - Delayed Sending You can chat with the community over at #quik-sms:matrix.org
